paragraphs.paragraph: MAP2K1 phosphorylates MAPK3 at Thr-202 and Tyr-204;ABL1 phosphorylates PLCG1 at Y394.

sentences.sentence: MAP2K1 phosphorylates MAPK3 at Thr-202 and Tyr-204; ABL1 phosphorylates PLCG1 at Y394.
